entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over Grand Manan Island. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
